dcterms:creator: Jiaheng Wei
Zhaowei Zhu
Hao Cheng
Tongliang Liu
Gang Niu
Yang Liu
dcterms:description: CIFAR-N is a label-noise benchmark that provides three noisy human annotations for each image of the CIFAR-10 training dataset, allowing for the exploration of human perceptual differences using these noisy human annotations.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-N

dcterms:creator: Joshua C Peterson
Ruairidh M Battleday
Thomas L Griffiths
Olga Russakovsky
dcterms:description: CIFAR-H provides 50 labels per image, allowing for the calculation of human agreement and annotation time, which are used to evaluate human performance in image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-H

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 is a dataset consisting of 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 classes, with 6,000 images per class, commonly used for training machine learning models in image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10
